thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 46 of 7355
thread.title: Mohammed

author: Mohammed
title: Mohammed
text:
My experience with B&H, online and in the showroom itself was impressive. It's not new by the way. B&H has always been my stop for my camera shopping for the last 11 years.
Being run by a team of pro-people who know about the subject and the fast yet precise work usually done makes this place your immediate destination for a lot of your shopping needs.
I thank every one in their.
